citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
G2-23: An open bag of sugar-coated cereal was found on a cabinet shelf in the procedure prep room. This room is used
to prepare animals for procedures and to store/prepare medications. It is not an area intended or used for food storage.
Per this Section, premises where housing facilities are located must be kept clean to facilitate housekeeping practices and
to reduce or eliminate living areas for pests. Although no pests were noted, the presence of an opened package of sugar-
coated cereal in a cabinet located in an area that is not used for food storage can attract unwanted insect pests. The
research facility corrected this item during the inspection by discarding the opened bag of cereal. To remain corrected
from this date 6/11/25 forward.
This inspection was conducted with facility representatives from 6/9/25 through 6/11/25. The exit briefing was held with
facility representatives 6/11/25.
*END OF REPORT*
n

narrative:
3.84(c) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
G2-23: An open bag of sugar-coated cereal was found on a cabinet shelf in the procedure prep room. This room is used 
to prepare animals for procedures and to store/prepare medications. It is not an area intended or used for food storage.  
 
Per this Section, premises where housing facilities are located must be kept clean to facilitate housekeeping practices and 
to reduce or eliminate living areas for pests. Although no pests were noted, the presence of an opened package of sugar-
coated cereal in a cabinet located in an area that is not used for food storage can attract unwanted insect pests. The 
research facility corrected this item during the inspection by discarding the opened bag of cereal. To remain corrected 
from this date 6/11/25 forward. 
 
This inspection was conducted with facility representatives from 6/9/25 through 6/11/25. The exit briefing was held with 
facility representatives 6/11/25. 
 
*END OF REPORT* 
 
 n
